articles.content: The market ended marginally higher on November 10, helped by buying in metal, capital goods and power stocks. The Sensex closed 72.48 points or 0.11 percent higher at 64,904.68, and the Nifty ended w… [+1033 chars]

articles.title: HAL Shares Hit 52-Week High as Q2 Earnings Cheers Investors - EquityPandit
articles.description: Hindustan Aeronautics Limited (HAL) shares hit a 52-week high of Rs 2,110.95 on 10 November after the company announced its earnings for the July-September quarter. The company reported a 1.26% year-on-year (YoY) increase in its consolidated net profit to Rs …
articles.content:
Hindustan Aeronautics Limited (HAL) shares hit a 52-week high of Rs 2,110.95 on 10 November after the company announced its earnings for the July-September quarter.

articles.author: Ananya Grover
articles.title: Engineers India Q2 Profit Beats Estimates, Drives Shares Over 8% - BQ Prime
articles.description: The company's Q2 consolidated net profit rose 69.5% year-on-year to Rs 127.5 crore, beating Bloomberg estimate of Rs 112.8 crore.
articles.content:
Shares of the company rose as much as 8.6%, before paring gains to trade 6.2% higher at 1:04 p.m., compared to a 0.05% advance in the NSE Nifty 50.
The stock has risen 73.7% on a year-to-date basis.… [+442 chars]
